Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red & Linden-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red & Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Wilson. Service is resuming

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red and Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Wilson. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity near Sheridan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity near Sheridan. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland, #108 Halsted/95th & #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th LaSalle
ShortDescription: 9. 108 & 112 buses rerouted SB via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette & 95th: NB via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted & 95th due to police activity near 95th LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#9 Ashland, #108 Halsted/95th and #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near 95th LaSalle.

  • Southbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, then resume their normal route on 95th.
  • Northbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
